Uses of Interface
org.shared.net.SocketManager

  • Packages that use SocketManager 
    Package Description
    org.shared.net
    A framework for transparent, scalable networking with asynchronous sockets.
    org.shared.net.nio
    A package for managed connections built on top of java.nio.

    • Uses of SocketManager in org.shared.net

      Classes in org.shared.net with type parameters of type SocketManager 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SocketManager<M extends SocketManager<M,C>,C extends SocketConnection>
      Defines a socket-based ConnectionManager.

    • Uses of SocketManager in org.shared.net.nio

      Classes in org.shared.net.nio that implement SocketManager 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NioManager
      A transparent, asynchronous sockets layer for easy network programming that performs readiness selection on NioConnections via callbacks.
